structure:Codelist.common:Name: Greek Main Employment Status Classification
structure:Codelist.common:Description: Classification of main employment status following International Labour Organization (ILO) standards for labor force statistics.

structure:Code.common:Name: Not applicable
structure:Code.common:Description: Not applicable to the data or special processing code.

structure:Code.common:Name: Employed
structure:Code.common:Description: Persons who worked for pay or profit during the reference period.

structure:Code.common:Name: Employees
structure:Code.common:Description: Persons who work for a public or private employer and receive remuneration in wages, salary, commission, tips, piece-rates, or pay in kind.

structure:Code.common:Name: Self-employed without employees
structure:Code.common:Description: Persons who work on their own account or with one or more partners, holding the type of job defined as a 'self-employment job', and have not engaged on a continuous basis any employees to work for them during the reference period.

structure:Code.common:Name: Self-employed with employees
structure:Code.common:Description: Persons who work on their own account or with one or more partners, holding the type of job defined as a 'self-employment job', and have engaged on a continuous basis one or more employees to work for them during the reference period.

structure:Code.common:Name: Family workers
structure:Code.common:Description: Persons who work without pay in an economic enterprise operated by a related person living in the same household.

structure:Code.common:Name: Unemployed
structure:Code.common:Description: Persons who are without work, available for work, and actively seeking work during the reference period.

structure:Code.common:Name: Inactive
structure:Code.common:Description: Persons who are neither employed nor unemployed, including students, homemakers, retired persons, and others not in the labor force.

structure:Code.common:Name: Total population aged 15+
structure:Code.common:Description: Total population aged 15 years and over, including all employment status categories.
